10 #define MAX_SINGLE_CHARS 8
11 
12 namespace audio_tools {
13 
19 class AudioPrint : public Print, public AudioBaseInfoDependent, public AudioBaseInfoSource {
20  public:
21  virtual size_t write(const uint8_t *buffer, size_t size) override = 0;
22 
23  virtual size_t write(uint8_t ch) override {
24  tmp[tmpPos++] = ch;
25  if (tmpPos>MAX_SINGLE_CHARS){
26  flush();
27  }
28  return 1;
29  }
30 
31  void flush() FLUSH_OVERRIDE {
32  write((const uint8_t*)tmp, tmpPos-1);
33  tmpPos=0;
34  }
35 
36  // overwrite to do something useful
37  virtual void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo info) {
38  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
39  info.logInfo();
40  if (p_notify!=nullptr){
41  p_notify->setAudioInfo(info);
42  }
43  }
44 
45  virtual void setNotifyAudioChange(AudioBaseInfoDependent &bi) {
46  p_notify = &bi;
47  }
48 
50  virtual bool doRelease() {
51  return false;
52  }
53 
54 
55 
56  protected:
57  uint8_t tmp[MAX_SINGLE_CHARS];
58  int tmpPos=0;
59  AudioBaseInfoDependent *p_notify=nullptr;
60 
61 };

73 class CsvStream : public AudioPrint {
74 
75  public:

77  this->active = active;

81  CsvStream(Print &out, int channels=2, int buffer_size=DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE, bool active=true) {
82  this->channels = channels;
83  this->out_ptr = &out;
84  this->active = active;
85  }
86 
88  void begin(){
89  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
90  this->active = true;
91  }
92 
94  AudioBaseInfo defaultConfig(){
95  AudioBaseInfo info;
96  info.channels = 2;
97  info.sample_rate = 44100;
98  info.bits_per_sample = sizeof(T)*8;
99  return info;
100  }
101 
103  void begin(AudioBaseInfo info){
104  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
105  this->active = true;
106  this->channels = info.channels;
107  }
108 
110  void begin(int channels, Print &out=Serial){
111  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
112  this->channels = channels;
113  this->out_ptr = &out;
114  this->active = true;
115  }
116 
118  void end() {
119  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
120  active = false;
121  }
122 
124  virtual void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo info) {
125  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
126  info.logInfo();
127  this->channels = info.channels;
128  };
129 
131  virtual size_t write(const uint8_t* data, size_t len) {
132  if (!active) return 0;
133  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
134  size_t lenChannels = len / (sizeof(T)*channels);
135  data_ptr = (T*)data;
136  for (size_t j=0;j<lenChannels;j++){
137  for (int ch=0;ch<channels;ch++){
138  if (out_ptr!=nullptr && data_ptr!=nullptr){
139  out_ptr->print(*data_ptr);
140  }
141  data_ptr++;
142  if (ch<channels-1) Serial.print(", ");
143  }
144  Serial.println();
145  }
146  return len;
147  }
148 
149  protected:
150  T *data_ptr;
151  Print *out_ptr = &Serial;
152  int channels = 2;
153  bool active = false;
154 
155 };

175  void begin(AudioBaseInfo info){
176  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
177  info.logInfo();
178  this->active = true;
179  pos = 0;
180  }
181 
182  void begin(){
183  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
184  this->active = true;
185  pos = 0;
186  }
187 
189  void end() {
190  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
191  active = false;
192  }
193 
194  void flush(){
195  Serial.println();
196  pos = 0;
197  }
198 
199  virtual size_t write(const uint8_t* data, size_t len) {
200  if (!active) return 0;
201  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
202  for (size_t j=0;j<len;j++){
203  out_ptr->print(data[j], HEX);
204  out_ptr->print(" ");
205  pos++;
206  if (pos == 8){
207  Serial.print(" - ");
208  }
209  if (pos == 16){
210  Serial.println();
211  pos = 0;
212  }
213  }
214  return len;
215  }
216 
217  protected:
218  Print *out_ptr = &Serial;
219  int pos = 0;
220  bool active = false;
221 };

351  encoder_ptr->setOutputStream(*outputStream);
352  writer_ptr = encoder_ptr;
353  begin();

355 
357  void begin(Print *outputStream, AudioDecoder *decoder) {
358  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
359  ptr_out = outputStream;
360  decoder_ptr = decoder;
361  decoder_ptr->setOutputStream(*outputStream);
362  writer_ptr = decoder_ptr;
363  begin();
364  }
365 
367  void begin() {
368  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
369  const CodecNOP *nop = CodecNOP::instance();
370  if (decoder_ptr != nop || encoder_ptr != nop){
371  decoder_ptr->begin();
372  encoder_ptr->begin();
373  active = true;
374  } else {
375  LOGW("no decoder or encoder defined");
376  }
377  }
378 
380  void begin(AudioBaseInfo info) {
381  LOGD(LOG_METHOD);
382  const CodecNOP *nop = CodecNOP::instance();
383  if (decoder_ptr != nop || encoder_ptr != nop){
384  // some decoders need this - e.g. opus
385  decoder_ptr->setAudioInfo(info);
386  decoder_ptr->begin();
387  encoder_ptr->setAudioInfo(info);
388  encoder_ptr->begin();
389  active = true;
390  } else {
391  LOGW("no decoder or encoder defined");
392  }
393  }
395  void end() {
396  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
397  decoder_ptr->end();
398  encoder_ptr->end();
399  active = false;
400  }
401 
403  virtual size_t write(const uint8_t *data, size_t len) override {
404  LOGD("%s: %zu", LOG_METHOD, len);
405  if(len==0) {
406  LOGI("write: %d",0);
407  return 0;
408  }
409 
410  if(writer_ptr==nullptr || data==nullptr){
411  LOGE("NPE");
412  return 0;
413  }
414 
415  CHECK_MEMORY();
416  size_t result = writer_ptr->write(data, len);
417  CHECK_MEMORY();
418  return result;
419  }
420 
421  int availableForWrite() override {
422  return ptr_out->availableForWrite();
423  }
424 
426  operator bool() {
427  return active;
428  }
429 
431  AudioDecoder &decoder() {
432  return *decoder_ptr;
433  }
434 
436  AudioEncoder &encoder() {
437  return *encoder_ptr;
438  }
439 
440  protected:
441  //ExternalBufferStream ext_buffer;
442  AudioDecoder *decoder_ptr = CodecNOP::instance(); // decoder
443  AudioEncoder *encoder_ptr = CodecNOP::instance(); // decoder
444  AudioWriter *writer_ptr = nullptr ;
445  Print *ptr_out=nullptr;
446 
447  uint8_t *write_buffer = nullptr;
448  int write_buffer_pos = 0;
449  const int write_buffer_size = 256;
450  bool active;
451 };

504 class MultiOutput : public AudioPrint {
505  public:
506 
508  MultiOutput() = default;
509 
511  MultiOutput(AudioPrint &out){
512  add(out);
513  }
514 
515  MultiOutput(AudioStream &out){
516  add(out);
517  }
518 
520  MultiOutput(AudioPrint &out1, AudioPrint &out2){
521  add(out1);
522  add(out2);
523  }
524 
526  MultiOutput(AudioStream &out1, AudioStream &out2){
527  add(out1);
528  add(out2);
529  }
530 
531  ~MultiOutput() {
532  for (int j=0;j<vector.size();j++){
533  if (vector[j]->doRelease()){
534  delete vector[j];
535  }
536  }
537  }
538 
539  bool begin(AudioBaseInfo info){
540  setAudioInfo(info);
541  return true;
542  }
543 
545  void add(AudioPrint &out){
546  vector.push_back(&out);
547  }
548 
550  void add(AudioStream &stream){
551  AdapterAudioStreamToAudioPrint* out = new AdapterAudioStreamToAudioPrint(stream);
552  vector.push_back(out);
553  }
554 
555  void add(Print &print){
556  AdapterPrintToAudioPrint* out = new AdapterPrintToAudioPrint(print);
557  vector.push_back(out);
558  }
559 
560  void flush() {
561  for (int j=0;j<vector.size();j++){
562  vector[j]->flush();
563  }
564  }
565 
566  void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo info){
567  for (int j=0;j<vector.size();j++){
568  vector[j]->setAudioInfo(info);
569  }
570  }
571 
572  size_t write(const uint8_t *buffer, size_t size){
573  for (int j=0;j<vector.size();j++){
574  int open = size;
575  int start = 0;
576  while(open>0){
577  int written = vector[j]->write(buffer+start, open);
578  open -= written;
579  start += written;
580  }
581  }
582  return size;
583  }
584 
585  size_t write(uint8_t ch){
586  for (int j=0;j<vector.size();j++){
587  int open = 1;
588  while(open>0){
589  open -= vector[j]->write(ch);
590  }
591  }
592  return 1;
593  }
594 
595  protected:
596  Vector<AudioPrint*> vector;
597 
598 };
599 
605 class VolumePrint : public AudioPrint {
606  public:
607  VolumePrint() = default;
608 
609  ~VolumePrint() {
610  if (volumes!=nullptr) delete volumes;
611  if (volumes_tmp!=nullptr) delete volumes_tmp;
612  }
613 
614  bool begin(AudioBaseInfo info){
615  setAudioInfo(info);
616  return true;
617  }
618 
619  void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo info){
620  this->info = info;
621  if (info.channels){
622  volumes = new float[info.channels];
623  volumes_tmp = new float[info.channels];
624  }
625  }
626 
627  size_t write(const uint8_t *buffer, size_t size){
628  float f_volume_tmp = 0;
629  for (int j=0;j<info.channels;j++){
630  volumes_tmp[j]=0;
631  }
632  switch(info.bits_per_sample){
633  case 16: {
634  int16_t *buffer16 = (int16_t*)buffer;
635  int samples16 = size/2;
636  for (int j=0;j<samples16;j++){
637  float tmp = static_cast<float>(abs(buffer16[j]));
638  updateVolume(tmp,j);
639  }
640  commit();
641  } break;
642  case 32: {
643  int32_t *buffer32 = (int32_t*)buffer;
644  int samples32 = size/4;
645  for (int j=0;j<samples32;j++){
646  float tmp = static_cast<float>(abs(buffer32[j]))/samples32;
647  updateVolume(tmp,j);
648  }
649  commit();
650  }break;
651 
652  default:
653  LOGE("Unsupported bits_per_sample: %d", info.bits_per_sample);
654  f_volume = 0;
655  break;
656  }
657  return size;
658  }
659 
661  float volume() {
662  return f_volume;
663  }
664 
666  float volume(int channel) {
667  return channel<info.channels ? volumes[channel]:0.0;
668  }
669 
670  protected:
671  AudioBaseInfo info;
672  float f_volume_tmp = 0;
673  float f_volume = 0;
674  float *volumes=nullptr;
675  float *volumes_tmp=nullptr;
676 
677  void updateVolume(float tmp, int j) {
678  if (tmp>f_volume){
679  f_volume_tmp = tmp;
680  }
681  if (volumes_tmp!=nullptr && tmp>volumes_tmp[j%info.channels]){
682  volumes_tmp[j%info.channels] = tmp;
683  }
684  }
685 
686  void commit(){
687  f_volume = f_volume_tmp;
688  for (int j=0;j<info.channels;j++){
689  volumes[j] = volumes_tmp[j];
690  }
691  }
692 };
693 
701 class FormatConverterStream : public AudioPrint {
703  struct Convert {
704  int multiply; // copy single to n channels
705  int step;
706  float factor = 1.0;
707  float format_factor = 1.0;
708  int offset = 0;
709  int target_bits_per_sample;
710  int source_bits_per_sample;
711  };
712 
713  template <class T>
714  class AudioArray{
715  public:
716  AudioArray(Convert &convert){
717  this->p_convert = &convert;
718  }
719 
720  size_t size() {
721  return size_val;
722  }
723 
724  T operator[](int pos){
725  return data[pos];
726  }
727 
728  // writes all input samples
729  void write(const uint8_t *dataIn, size_t len, Print &out){
730  this->data = (T*)dataIn;
731  this->size_val = len;
732  // we process all input samples
733  for (size_t j=0;j<size();j++){
734  T value = data[j];
735  // convert to output format
736  switch(p_convert->target_bits_per_sample){
737  case 8: {
738  int8_t out_value8 = (p_convert->factor * p_convert->format_factor * value) + p_convert->offset;
739  byte arr[p_convert->multiply];
740  memset(arr, out_value8, p_convert->multiply);
741  out.write((const uint8_t*)arr, p_convert->multiply);
742  } break;
743  case 16: {
744  int16_t out_value16 = (p_convert->factor * p_convert->format_factor * value) + p_convert->offset;
745  for (int ch=0;ch<p_convert->multiply;ch++){
746  out.write((const uint8_t*)&out_value16, 2);
747  }
748  } break;
749  case 24: {
750  int32_t out_value24 = (p_convert->factor * p_convert->format_factor * value) + p_convert->offset;
751  for (int ch=0;ch<p_convert->multiply;ch++){
752  out.write((const uint8_t*)&out_value24, 3);
753  }
754  } break;
755  case 32: {
756  int32_t out_value32 = (p_convert->factor * p_convert->format_factor * value) + p_convert->offset;
757  for (int ch=0;ch<p_convert->multiply;ch++){
758  out.write((const uint8_t*)&out_value32, 4);
759  }
760  } break;
761  }
762  }
763  }
764 
765  protected:
766  T* data=nullptr;
767  size_t size_val;
768  int target_bits_per_sample=16;
769  Convert *p_convert;
770  };
771 
772  public:
773  FormatConverterStream() = default;
774 
775  FormatConverterStream(Print &out) {
776  setStream(out);
777  }
778 
779  FormatConverterStream(Print &out, AudioBaseInfo &infoOut, AudioBaseInfo &infoIn){
780  this->p_out = &out;
781  p_info_out = &infoOut;
782  p_info_in = &infoIn;
783 
784  setup();
785  }
786 
788  void setStream(Print &out){
789  this->p_out = &out;
790  }
791 
793  void setInputInfo(AudioBaseInfo &info){
794  p_info_in = &info;
795  setup();
796  }
797 
798 
800  void setInfo(AudioBaseInfo &info){
801  p_info_out = &info;
802  setup();
803  }
804 
806  void setFactor(float factor){
807  convert.factor = factor;
808  }
809 
811  void setOffset(int offset){
812  convert.offset = offset;
813  }
814 
816  virtual size_t write(const uint8_t *data, size_t len){
817  size_t result = 0;
818  if (no_conversion){
819  result = p_out->write(data, len);
820  } else if (convert.multiply>0){
821  switch(p_info_in->bits_per_sample) {
822  case 8: {
823  array8.write(data, len, *p_out);
824  result = len;
825  } break;
826  case 16: {
827  array16.write(data, len/2, *p_out);
828  result = len;
829  } break;
830  case 24: {
831  array24.write(data, len/3,*p_out);
832  result = len;
833  } break;
834  case 32: {
835  array32.write(data, len/4,*p_out);
836  result = len;
837  } break;
838  }
839  }
840  return result;
841  }
842 
843  protected:
844  bool no_conversion = false;
845  Print *p_out;
846  AudioBaseInfo *p_info_out=nullptr,*p_info_in=nullptr;
847  Convert convert;
848  AudioArray<int8_t> array8 = AudioArray<int8_t>(convert);
849  AudioArray<int16_t> array16 = AudioArray<int16_t>(convert);
850  AudioArray<int24_t> array24 = AudioArray<int24_t>(convert);
851  AudioArray<int32_t> array32 = AudioArray<int32_t>(convert);
852 
853 
854  void setup() {
855  if (p_info_out!=nullptr && p_info_in!=nullptr){
856  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
857  convert.source_bits_per_sample = p_info_in->bits_per_sample;
858  convert.target_bits_per_sample = p_info_out->bits_per_sample;
859  if (convert.source_bits_per_sample != convert.target_bits_per_sample){
860  convert.format_factor = NumberConverter::maxValue(convert.target_bits_per_sample) / NumberConverter::maxValue(convert.source_bits_per_sample);
861  LOGI("FormatConverterStream: bits %d -> %d - factor %f",convert.source_bits_per_sample, convert.target_bits_per_sample, convert.format_factor);
862  } else {
863  convert.format_factor = 1.0;
864  }
865 
866  if (p_info_out->bits_per_sample == p_info_in->bits_per_sample
867  && p_info_out->channels == p_info_in->channels ){
868  no_conversion = true;
869  LOGI("FormatConverterStream: no conversion")
870  } else if (p_info_out->channels == p_info_in->channels){
871  // copy 1:1
872  convert.multiply = 1;
873  convert.step = 1;
874  LOGI("FormatConverterStream: no channel conversion")
875  } else if (p_info_in->channels == 1 && p_info_out->channels>1){
876  // generate multiple output channels per frame
877  convert.multiply = p_info_out->channels;
878  convert.step = 1;
879  LOGI("FormatConverterStream: multiply channels by %d", convert.multiply);
880 
881  } else if (p_info_out->channels == 1){
882  convert.multiply = 1;
883  convert.step = p_info_in->channels; // just output 1 channel per frame
884  LOGI("FormatConverterStream: no conversion 1 channel")
885  } else {
886  convert.multiply = 0;
887  LOGE("invalid input vs output channels");
888  }
889  }
890  }
891 
892 };
893 
894 
895 } //n namespace
